A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's between Last Jedi and Phantom menace for worst Star Wars movie to date.  Having been a Star Wars lover since seeing A New Hope\, the SJW at disney have finally chased me away.  I enjoy story telling and it was disjointed most of the way.  I didn't find the acting or the actors very compelling. It didn't get me emotionally involved as I do with good movies.  I'm sure others liked it and I'm glad for them\, but as for me\, I'm through with Star Wars.
